messages.content: if god was one of us, who would be his favorite music band?
If God were one of us, his favorite music band would probably be the Beatles.

The Beatles are one of the most popular and iconic music bands of all time. Their music is timeless and their influence on popular culture is undeniable. Plus, their songs are full of universal themes of love, peace, and unity that speak to people of all faiths. So, if God were one of us, the Beatles would definitely be his favorite music band.
